channel.title: Computer Equipment Transportation
channel.description:
What would be the best way to transport a lot of computer equipment for a video editing and development company? We're talking about equipment for 217 employees. The distance is from Philadelphia, PA and Cleveland, OH to Baltimore, MD. To be exact, there are 120 employees in PA and 97 in OH.
Edit: Also, what would the best VPN router be if you need all 217 employees to have the ability to communicate with another VPN router in another location so they'd basically be on one network. The city in this case, would be Chicago, IL.

item.title: Computer Equipment Transportation
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

I think this is the wrong place to ask such a question. You should consult a professional.

Read full topic
